definitions.definition: The quality or condition of being prevalent ; wide extension or spread.
The total number of cases of a disease in a given statistical population at a given time, divided by the number of individuals in that population.

main_definition: The quality or condition of being prevalent ; wide extension or spread.
secondary_definitions: ( epidemiology ) The total number of cases of a disease in a given statistical population at a given time, divided by the number of individuals in that population.
